textBox.richText: From June 22 to July 3, André Anjos from the Biometrics group and one of the main architect of the BEAT platform, was invited to present the BEAT platform -- an online platform for reproducible research in computational science -- in various institutions such as the Universidade Estadual Paulista (Unesp), the Center for Research and Development (CPqD), the Universidade Federal de Juiz de Fora (UFJF) and the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro. Thank you to our colleagues from Brazil and their funding agencies for this great opportunity to present the BEAT platform.
